content: this is a very easy pattern that uses simple garter stitch for the top and bottom borders and stockinette stitch throughout the addition of subtle sparkle adds a touch of fun and interest without adding complexity it is a relaxing knit that works well for new knitters while still being enjoyable for more experienced knitters looking for an uncomplicated satisfying project the pattern creates a soft gently textured baby blanket with wide cozy stripes and light sparkly eyelet detail that adds dimension without being difficult to work the finished fabric has a lovely drape and feels substantial yet soft instructions begin with a brief overview of the design and construction so you know what to expect before you start the pattern is worked flat and the stitch pattern is easy to memorize making it ideal for knitting on the go or relaxing at home multiple sizes are included sizes for larger blankets are listed separately and clearly noted with adjusted stitch counts and yarn requirements to help you choose the size that best fits your needs the amount of yarn needed is approximate depending on gauge **stroller** 280 yards each of mc and cc/ 40 yards of sparkly for for 22 x 28 **baby** 360 yards each of mc and cc/ 60 yards of sparkly for 28 x 36 **small** 600 yards mc and cc/ 80 yards of sparkly for for 38 x 42 **medium** 850 yards each of mc and cc/ 80 yards of sparkly for 48 x 60 **large** 1100 yards each of mc and cc/ 100 yards of sparkly for 60 x 80
